content:
I'm working on applying a PA change to add the extended contact detail (as noted in tracker https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29035)
And there is some rendering issue that I can't spot in the source - the tabs are not added for the new type, however they are there for all the others on the page... @Grahame Grieve @Bryn Rhodes - did you have troubles when you added the others on here?
http://build.fhir.org/branches/PatientAdmin_BP-ExtendedContactDetail/metadatatypes.html#ExtendedContactDetail

This should render as tabs, not bullets...
image.png
Oh. you need to register that set of tabs at the foot of the file
